title: ImageDrawRoundRect
name: ImageDrawRoundRect
description: Draws a rectangle with rounded corners.

arguments.name: name
arguments.description: The image on which this operation is performed.

arguments.name: x
arguments.description: The x coordinate of the rectangle.

arguments.name: y
arguments.description: The y coordinate of the rectangle.

arguments.name: arcWidth
arguments.description: The horizontal diameter of the arc at the four corners.

arguments.name: arcHeight
arguments.description: The vertical diameter of the arc at the four corners.

arguments.name: filled
arguments.description:
Specify whether the rectangle is filled:
- true: The rectangle is filled with the specified drawing color.
- false (default): Only the outline of the rectangle is drawn.
